summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed individual to appear and testify in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell on November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906. The subpoena is dated July 12, 2021, and signed by the U.S. Attorney and an Assistant U.S. Attorney.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual who is the subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, for which the subpoena is issued to compel testimony.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed the subpoena.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Testimony
events.description: The subpoena commands an individual to appear before the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York to testify and give evidence in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York, Southern District of New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on July 12, 2021, by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York for testimony in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case.
The subpoena commands an unnamed individual to appear in court on November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906.
Failure to comply with the subpoena constitutes contempt of court and subjects the individual to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
The subpoena is related to the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, case number 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
The document is signed by United States Attorney Audrey Strauss and an Assistant United States Attorney.
